questions.question: Which scenario would benefit MOST from using provisioned concurrency?
options: An application with highly variable and unpredictable traffic patterns.
A real-time fraud detection system in a financial institution that requires low latency and high availability.
A machine learning (ML) model that receives infrequent inference requests.
A batch processing workload that processes large volumes of data at scheduled intervals.
correct_answers: A real-time fraud detection system in a financial institution that requires low latency and high availability.
questions.topic: 4.2 Monitor and Optimize Infrastructure and Costs
